title: Strengthening Leadership Competencies: Comparative Study of Integrated and Separated Teaching Methods for Teacher Knowledge Development

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary educational theories and biology content knowledge (sensory organs and skin structure)
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the components of Content Knowledge (CK) and Pedagogical Content Knowledge (PCK).
Learners can compare the strengths and weaknesses of integrated/separate teaching methods and select an approach suitable for their educational context.
Learners can use video-based assessment tools to analyze PCK application cases and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
